name: Netidscript
tagline: A script to retrieve netID's from Notre Dame's Directory online application from last names.
body:
### Welcome to My Bookmarklet Page.
I was experimenting with bookmarklets for a while when I had a university project to locate the user IDs of faculty so that they could be entered for a department election. The only way to find the user ID was by entering the faculty member's name into my university's online directory form - only one name could be submitted at a time. To expedite the process of locating over 200 faculty member's IDs, I decided to look into bookmarklets. Although I found them to be a really interesting tool, I decided to stop pursuing this project when I learned that the Content Security Policy (2015) prevented me from using jQuery and my files hosted on this site in my bookmarklets on other sites.

December 24, 2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
